text: Ta jiang shi ni zhe bu jingdian, qizhong you xuduo mingque de jie wen, shi quan jing de jiben; hai you bie de xuduo yin wei de jie wen. Xin cun xienian de ren, zuncong yin wei de jie wen, qitu xiao huo renxin, tanqiu jing yi de jiujing. Zhiyou zhenzhu he xuewen jingtong de rencai zhidao jing yi de jiujing.
